name: Mudcar Sprint
description:
Mudcar Sprint is a game about driving around in a mud circle trying to avoid other cars. You only have 4 lanes and you can switch your lane with arrow keys.

Made for Ludum Dare 47 in 48 hours for the compo.

Controls: Left and right arrow keys

Programs used:

Unity 3D engine
Blender for 3D models
BFXR and Cubase for sounds and music (car sounds are from my real car btw).
